EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting The MENTOR Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Prospects__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for your interest in becoming a Mentor and making a difference in someone’s life. Although The MENTOR Network provides services in {!Prospects__c.zzEmailStateName__c}, we do not currently offer our Host Home or foster care services―the programs where we partner with individuals who are interested in making a difference by opening their hearts and homes to individuals in need of support―in your state.
We will keep you posted in the event we expand our services in {!Prospects__c.zzEmailStateName__c} in the future.
To learn more about us please visit www.thementornetwork.com.
Thanks again for your interest in becoming a Mentor!
